archives.name: Tour History
archives.body: Tour history compiled by Paul Rymer at Nightporter.co.uk. Reproduced here for clarity. For greater detail on each date (images, setlists, bootlegs, etc), visit Nightporter.co.uk/pages/japlive.htm.

contents.excerpt: Downstairs at the Rock Garden w/ The Lurkers
90 Wardour Street W1, w/ Grand Hotel
UK tour supporting Jim Capaldi and the Contenders

contents.venue: Free Trade Hall or Manchester Apollo [?]

contents.excerpt: Supposedly attended by members of Duran Duran
The New Rising Sound Tour. The last time Japan appeared in public with the full "glam" look.
The New Rising Sound Tour. First appearance of the "Life in Tokyo" look.
Two sets: 6:30pm and 9:30pm. Last ever gig in North America.
Quiet Life Tour. Broadcast on FM radio.
Polaroids Tour Supposedly one of Rob Dean's favourite shows.
